meta.name: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
meta.author: Infocom (converted by PyMeshZork)
meta.description: The complete classic text adventure game

whous.name: West of House
whous.description_first: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

exits.message: The door is boarded and you can't remove the boards.

nhous.name: North of House
nhous.description_first: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

shous.name: South of House
shous.description_first: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

ehous.name: Behind House
ehous.description_first: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

kitch.name: Kitchen
kitch.description_first: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

exits.message: Only Santa Claus climbs down chimneys.

lroom.name: Living Room
lroom.description_first: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

attic.name: Attic
attic.description_first: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down. A large coil of rope is lying in the corner. On a table is a nasty-looking knife.

cella.name: Cellar
cella.description_first: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.

exits.message: The ramp is too steep to climb.

mtrol.name: Troll Room
mtrol.description_first: This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by straining fingers) mar the walls.

exits.message: The troll fends you off with a menacing gesture.

fore1.name: Forest
fore1.description_first: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

fore2.name: Forest
fore2.description_first: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

fore3.name: Forest Path
fore3.description_first: This is a path winding through a dimly lit forest. The path heads north-south here. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands at the edge of the path.

clear.name: Clearing
clear.description_first: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.

uptree.name: Up a Tree
uptree.description_first: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach. Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.

canyv.name: Canyon View
canyv.description_first: You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its west wall. From here there is a marvelous view of the canyon and parts of the Frigid River upstream. Across the canyon, the walls of the White Cliffs join the mighty ramparts of the Flathead Mountains to the east. Following the canyon upstream to the north, Aragain Falls may be seen, complete with rainbow. The canyon stretches off in the distance to the southwest.

ledge.name: Rocky Ledge
ledge.description_first: You are on a ledge about halfway up the wall of the river canyon. You can see from here that the Great Canyon stretches off into the distance. Far below you can see the whitish froth of the river against the craggy cliffs of the gorge. Above you the face of the cliff rises vertically out of sight. There is no way up from here without climbing equipment.

cnybm.name: Canyon Bottom
cnybm.description_first: You are beneath the walls of the river canyon which may be climbable here. The canyon runs north and south.

strmv.name: Stream View
strmv.description_first: You are standing on a path beside a gently flowing stream. The path follows the stream through the forest.

strea.name: Stream
strea.description_first: You are on the gently sloping bank of a stream, which is flowing down from somewhere above. Upstream you can see a wooden dam blocking the river.

mgrat.name: Grating Room
mgrat.description_first: You are in a small room near the surface. A shaft of sunlight from above illuminates the room. In one corner is a pile of leaves. A narrow passage leads north.

maze1.name: Maze
maze1.description_first: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze2.name: Maze
maze2.description_first: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze3.name: Maze
maze3.description_first: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze4.name: Maze
maze4.description_first: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze5.name: Maze
maze5.description_first: You are in a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maz15.name: Grating Room
maz15.description_first: You are in a small room near the surface. A shaft of sunlight from above illuminates the room. In one corner is a pile of leaves. A narrow passage leads north.

dcell.name: Dead End
dcell.description_first: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

estof.name: East of Chasm
estof.description_first: You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. The east edge is a narrow ledge looking across to a thin land bridge.

galry.name: Gallery
galry.description_first: This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings have been stolen by vandals with exceptional taste. A doorway leads south.

studi.name: Studio
studi.description_first: This is what was once an artist's studio. It appears the artist has moved on, perhaps scared away by the vandals. Many empty frames line the walls.

ewwch.name: East-West Passage
ewwch.description_first: This is a narrow east-west passageway. There is a hole in the floor from which a foul stench emanates.

round.name: Round Room
round.description_first: This is a circular stone room with passages in all directions. Several of them have unfortunately been blocked by cave-ins.

nsrm1.name: North-South Passage
nsrm1.description_first: This is a narrow north-south passage.

chasm.name: Chasm
chasm.description_first: A chasm runs southwest to northeast and the path follows it. You are on the south side of the chasm, where a crack opens into a dark passage.

reser.name: Reservoir
reser.description_first: You are at the edge of a large underground reservoir. There is a path along the edge of the reservoir.

rsout.name: Reservoir South
rsout.description_first: You are at the southern edge of a large underground reservoir.

ssmrm.name: Mirror Room
ssmrm.description_first: You are in a large room with a mirror on each wall. Above you hangs a large chandelier.

llrm2.name: Loud Room
llrm2.description_first: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a narrow passage from east to west and a stone stairway leading upward.

lld2.name: Loud Room
lld2.description_first: This is a large room. A narrow passage goes west, and a stone stairway leads upward. The room is eerie in its quietness.

damp.name: Damp Cave
damp.description_first: This is a cave. The walls are covered with moisture. A passage leads south, and there is a crawlway to the west.

wfiss.name: White Cliffs Beach
wfiss.description_first: You are on a narrow strip of beach beside the Frigid River.

wcave.name: White Cliffs Cave
wcave.description_first: You are in a small cave. There is a passage to the east and a crawlway to the north.

engra.name: Engravings Cave
engra.description_first: You are in a cave with engravings on the wall. An exit leads northwest and a crawlway leads south.

dome.name: Dome Room
dome.description_first: You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling of another room below. Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a wooden railing which circles the dome.

exits.message: You cannot go down without a rope.

mtorc.name: Torch Room
mtorc.description_first: This is a large room with a high ceiling. A wooden door leads west. On the walls of the room are three torches. One is lit, one is out, and one is missing.

exits.message: You cannot climb up without a rope.

egypt.name: Egyptian Room
egypt.description_first: This is a room which looks like an Egyptian tomb. A passage leads north.

echor.name: Echo Room
echor.description_first: This is a very large room with a low ceiling. There are exits in all directions.

temp1.name: Temple
temp1.description_first: This is the north end of a large temple. On the east and west walls are engravings. A few, like 'Strangle the Troll' and 'Defenestrate the Ogre', are still legible. Large doors at the north end of the temple are closed.

temp2.name: Altar
temp2.description_first: This is the south end of a large temple. In front of you is what appears to be an altar. On the altar is a large black book.

treas.name: Treasure Room
treas.description_first: This is a huge room filled with piles of treasure. Valuable items are scattered everywhere.

entrc.name: Entrance to Hades
entrc.description_first: You are outside a large gateway which blocks the entrance to Hades.

hades.name: Land of the Living Dead
hades.description_first: You are in a gloomy room lit only by a flickering light. On the wall hangs a bell pull.

smele.name: Smelly Room
smele.description_first: This is a small room with a foul stench. A passage leads south.

gas.name: Gas Room
gas.description_first: This room has a damp floor. A passage leads west.

coal1.name: Coal Mine
coal1.description_first: This is a dead-end in a coal mine.

coal2.name: Ladder Top
coal2.description_first: This is the top of a wooden ladder. There is a room to the north.

coal3.name: Ladder Bottom
coal3.description_first: This is the bottom of a wooden ladder.

coal4.name: Dead End
coal4.description_first: You have come to a dead end.

tshaf.name: Shaft Room
tshaf.description_first: This is a small room with a shaft descending into the darkness.

bshaf.name: Shaft Bottom
bshaf.description_first: This is the bottom of the shaft. A passage leads south.

mmach.name: Machine Room
mmach.description_first: This is a large room dominated by a huge machine. The machine is quiet and cold.

mcycl.name: Cyclops Room
mcycl.description_first: This is a room with a cyclops in it.

strng.name: Strange Passage
strng.description_first: This is a strange passage that leads in many directions.

rivr1.name: Frigid River
rivr1.description_first: You are on the Frigid River in a small magic boat. The river is smooth here.

rivr2.name: Frigid River
rivr2.description_first: The river is moving faster here. The banks look rocky.

exits.message: The shore is too rocky to land.

rivr3.name: Frigid River
rivr3.description_first: The river continues through a narrow canyon. The current is swift.

rivr4.name: Frigid River
rivr4.description_first: You can hear the roar of a waterfall somewhere downstream.

rivr5.name: Frigid River
rivr5.description_first: The river is rushing toward a waterfall ahead!

sbeac.name: Sandy Beach
sbeac.description_first: You are on a sandy beach at the bank of the Frigid River. There is a cave to the south.

scave.name: Sandy Cave
scave.description_first: This is a sandy cave near the river.

carou.name: Carousel Room
carou.description_first: You are in a circular room which is spinning. There are exits in all directions, but it is hard to tell which one to take.

riddl.name: Riddle Room
riddl.description_first: This is a room with a large inscription on the wall.

pearl.name: Pearl Room
pearl.description_first: This is a small room with an opening to the east.

falls.name: Aragain Falls
falls.description_first: You are at the top of Aragain Falls, a magnificent waterfall with a drop of some 450 feet. The only path here is on the western edge.

mrain.name: On the Rainbow
mrain.description_first: You are on top of a beautiful rainbow arching over the falls. From here, you could go either east to the falls, west to the cliff, or down through the mist.

pog.name: End of Rainbow
pog.description_first: You are on a small, rocky beach on the west shore of the river. The falls are visible to the east.

mbarr.name: Dam Base
mbarr.description_first: You are at the base of Flood Control Dam #3. The water is cascading over the dam and into a large reservoir.

fchmp.name: Dam
fchmp.description_first: You are standing on the top of Flood Control Dam #3, which was quite a feat of engineering in its day.

damma.name: Dam
damma.description_first: You are on the east edge of the dam. From here you can see the mighty Frigid River stretching away into the distance.

dlobb.name: Dam Lobby
dlobb.description_first: This room appears to have been the waiting room for tourists who visited the dam. There are exits to the north and east. A flight of stairs leads down.

maint.name: Maintenance Room
maint.description_first: This is what appears to have been the maintenance room for the dam. There are various tools scattered around.

damro.name: Dam
damro.description_first: This is a room on the east side of the dam. A stairway leads down.

vlbot.name: Volcano Bottom
vlbot.description_first: You are at the bottom of a volcanic shaft. The walls are warm to the touch.

vair1.name: In the Balloon
vair1.description_first: You are in a hot air balloon.

vair2.name: In the Balloon
vair2.description_first: You are in a hot air balloon, drifting in the volcanic shaft.

vair3.name: In the Balloon
vair3.description_first: You are in a hot air balloon, high in the volcanic shaft.

vair4.name: In the Balloon
vair4.description_first: You are in a hot air balloon at the top of the volcanic shaft.

ledg2.name: Narrow Ledge
ledg2.description_first: You are on a narrow ledge inside the volcano.

ledg3.name: Narrow Ledge
ledg3.description_first: You are on a narrow ledge inside the volcano.

ledg4.name: Narrow Ledge
ledg4.description_first: You are on a narrow ledge at the top of the volcanic shaft.

libra.name: Library
libra.description_first: This is a library, with books covering the walls. A stairway leads down.

bkent.name: Bank Entrance
bkent.description_first: This is the entrance to a bank. There is a door to the north.

bktvw.name: Viewing Room
bktvw.description_first: This is a viewing room overlooking the bank.

bktwi.name: Teller's Room
bktwi.description_first: This appears to have been a teller's room. There are broken windows everywhere.

bkvau.name: Bank Vault
bkvau.description_first: This is the bank vault. The door is extremely heavy.

bkbox.name: Safety Deposit Room
bkbox.description_first: This room contains rows of safety deposit boxes.

crypt.name: Crypt
crypt.description_first: This is a dark and musty crypt.

mailb.name: small mailbox
mailb.description: There is a small mailbox here.
mailb.examine: The mailbox is a small mailbox.

leafl.name: leaflet
leafl.examine: The leaflet is a small piece of paper.
leafl.read_text:
WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be without one!

sword.name: elvish sword
sword.description: Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.
sword.examine: The sword is of exquisite craftsmanship. It is inscribed with ancient elvish runes.

lamp.name: brass lantern
lamp.description: There is a brass lantern (battery-powered) here.
lamp.examine: The lamp is a battery-powered brass lantern.

rug.name: oriental rug
rug.examine: The rug is extremely beautiful and tightly woven. It does not appear to be attached to the floor.

rope.name: coil of rope
rope.description: A large coil of rope is lying in the corner.
rope.examine: The rope is strong and about 50 feet long.

knife.name: nasty knife
knife.description: On a table is a nasty-looking knife.
knife.examine: The knife looks very sharp and unpleasant.

troll.name: troll
troll.description: A nasty-looking troll, brandishing a bloody axe, blocks all passages out of the room.
troll.examine: The troll is a large, nasty creature that wants nothing more than to kill you.

axe.name: bloody axe
axe.examine: The axe is covered in blood and looks extremely dangerous.

sack.name: brown sack
sack.description: On the table is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.
sack.examine: The sack is an ordinary brown sack.

garli.name: clove of garlic
garli.examine: The garlic is a standard cooking ingredient.

bottl.name: glass bottle
bottl.description: A bottle is sitting on the table.
bottl.examine: The glass bottle contains a quantity of water.

nest.name: bird's nest
nest.description: Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.
nest.examine: The nest looks like it was made by a songbird of some kind.

egg.name: jewel-encrusted egg
egg.examine: The egg is covered with beautiful jewels that glitter in the light.

leave.name: pile of leaves
leave.description: There is a pile of leaves here.
leave.examine: The leaves are brown and dry.

grate.name: grating
grate.description: There is a grating securely fastened into the ground.

coal.name: small pile of coal
coal.description: There is a small pile of coal here.
coal.examine: It is ordinary coal, suitable for burning.

machi.name: machine
machi.description: There is a large machine here.
machi.examine: The machine is a coal-operated gadget that looks like it would convert coal into diamonds.

diamo.name: huge diamond
diamo.examine: The diamond is enormous and sparkles brilliantly.

keys.name: set of skeleton keys
keys.description: There is a set of skeleton keys here.
keys.examine: The keys are old but still functional.

bar.name: platinum bar
bar.description: There is a large platinum bar here.
bar.examine: The bar is stamped 'Frobozz Magic Platinum Company'.

coffi.name: gold coffin
coffi.description: There is a gold coffin here.
coffi.examine: The coffin is beautifully crafted, with gold hieroglyphics.

torch.name: ivory torch
torch.description: There is an ivory torch here.
torch.examine: The torch is made of ivory and burns with an eternal flame.

bell.name: brass bell
bell.description: There is a brass bell here.
bell.examine: The bell is made of brass and is very heavy.

book.name: black book
book.description: On the altar is a large black book.
book.examine: The book is written in a strange language.
book.read_text: This ancient tome contains many dark secrets of the Great Underground Empire.

candl.name: pair of candles
candl.description: A pair of candles is here.
candl.examine: The candles are white and unlit.

match.name: matchbook
match.examine: The matchbook contains several wooden matches.

wrenc.name: wrench
wrenc.examine: The wrench is made of solid steel.

screw.name: screwdriver
screw.examine: The screwdriver has a flat head.

cyclo.name: cyclops
cyclo.description: A cyclops, who looks extremely hungry, blocks the staircase.
cyclo.examine: The cyclops has one large eye and very large hands.

chali.name: silver chalice
chali.description: There is a silver chalice here.
chali.examine: The chalice is beautifully crafted with intricate designs.

thief.name: thief
thief.description: There is a seedy-looking individual, wielding a stiletto, here.
thief.examine: The thief is a dangerous character.

still.name: stiletto
still.examine: The stiletto is thin and deadly.

pot.name: pot of gold
pot.description: At the end of the rainbow is a pot of gold.
pot.examine: The pot is full of gold coins.

buoy.name: buoy
buoy.description: There is a red buoy here.
buoy.examine: The buoy is made of cork and marked with the words 'Frobozz Magic Buoy Company'.

shove.name: shovel
shove.examine: The shovel is a standard digging implement.

scara.name: jeweled scarab
scara.description: There is a jeweled scarab here.
scara.examine: The scarab is encrusted with precious gems.

trunk.name: trunk of jewels
trunk.description: There is a trunk filled with jewels here.
trunk.examine: The trunk overflows with precious stones.

paint.name: painting
paint.description: A painting is on the wall.
paint.examine: The painting depicts a fiendishly detailed scene of a hellscape.

iboat.name: magic boat
iboat.description: There is a pile of plastic here which has a small valve on it.
iboat.examine: The boat is made of plastic and has 'Frobozz Magic Boat Co.' printed on it.

pump.name: hand pump
pump.description: There is a hand pump here.
pump.examine: The pump is for inflating something.

statu.name: crystal statue
statu.description: There is a beautiful crystal statue here.
statu.examine: The statue is made of pure crystal and depicts a warrior.

saffr.name: tin of spices
saffr.description: There is a tin of rare spices here.

bills.name: stack of bills
bills.description: There is a stack of bills here.
bills.examine: The bills are worth a small fortune.

portr.name: portrait
portr.examine: The portrait depicts J. Pierpont Flathead.

canar.name: golden canary
canar.description: A golden clockwork canary is here.
canar.examine: The canary is made of gold and sings when wound.

ghost.name: ghost
ghost.description: The ghost of a spirit haunts this place.
ghost.examine: The ghost is pale and translucent.

skele.name: skeleton
skele.examine: The skeleton appears to be centuries old.

ballo.name: hot air balloon
ballo.description: There is a hot air balloon here.
ballo.examine: The balloon is large and colorful.

recep.name: receptacle
recep.description: There is a wire receptacle here.
recep.examine: The receptacle can hold small objects.

brick.name: brick
brick.examine: The brick is red and heavy.

fuse.name: fuse
fuse.examine: The fuse is short and appears to be functional.
